1.name: Mir Worldbuilding
1.body: Worldbuilding for fun! Realistic world, no magic, too much focus on gyres.

5.name: Cool Ideas
5.body: Possibly plot points, or arc ideas.

6.name: Key Plot Points
6.body: Main decisions to be made by the party.

7.name: Plot Overview
7.body: The general overview of the plot. Lorem ipsum blah de blah.

8.name: The Voyage
8.body: A ship travelling from X to Y is carrying cargo and noble passengers, and is nearing the end of a long voyage.

9.name: The Mutiny
9.body: The crew, angered by a long trip with a pompous captain, decide they've had enough.

10.name: For the Crew
10.body: The party decide to side with the crew, and are forced to take the princess prisoner.

11.name: For the Realm
11.body: The party decide to side with the captain and help them and the royal entourage defeat the crew.

12.name: The Storm
12.body: The ship is struck by a voilent storm and is wrecked onto the rocks along the coast. The party is marooned along with the royalty.
